author: Mike Cherney
title: 'Strangest Easter': Coronavirus Clamps Down on Services Across World...
description: 'Strangest Easter': Coronavirus Clamps Down on Services Across World... (Top headline, 4th story, link ) Related stories: NYT: Behind Trump's Failure on Covid-19... Repeatedly played down seriousness... Five Takeaways on What He Knew... Kentucky Will Track Do…
content:
Social-distancing requirements forced churches around the world to hold Easter services in empty cathedrals on Sunday, as officials warned any early signs of success in curbing the spread of the coronavirus didnt mean a quick resumption of normal life.
